instruction_text: Chercher les demandeurs et donneurs d'aide autour de vous
by_signing_you_are_agree: By signing up you agree to
label_visible_text: Garder mon numéro de portable visible pour ceux qui en ont besoin
identify_location: Identifiez votre adresse, puis sélectionnez ci-dessous
hint_conditions:
Enter constraints on timings, delivery, selection ... 
ANY info useful for the requestor to know
request_confirmation:
Your Request for Help has been registered.

Would you like to search for Help-Providers in your location?

Would you like to search for Help-Providers in your location?
offer_confirmation:
Your Offer to Help has been registered.

Would you like to search for Help-Requesters in your location?

Would you like to search for Help-Requesters in your location?
no_help_provider: Currently there are no help-providers in the selected map-area. You can search other locations on the map, or click Continue below to register your request.
phone_number_will_be_send_to_provider: Votre numéro de téléphone sera envoyé à ces donneurs d'aide
no_help_requeter: Currently there are no help-requesters in the selected map-area. You can search other locations on the map, or click Continue below to register your offer.
phone_number_will_be_send_to_requester: Votre numéro de téléphone sera envoyé à ces demandeurs d'aide
request_help_text: They will call you, if they can help you
label_no_request_send: You have not requested for any help.
no_request_sent:
Your request was registered, but no direct request has been sent to anyone yet.

Others may offer to help you when they see your request on the map.
niu_was_sent: a reçu une demande d'aide à
no_offer_sent:
Your offer was registered, but no direct offer has been sent to anyone yet.

Others may request your help when they see your offer on the map

This offer will remain active until you cancel it
offer_help_text: Ils vous appelleront s'ils ont encore besoin d'aide
no_offer_sended: You have not offered to help yet.
help_from_them: D'autres personnes devraient-elles accepter leur aide ?
someone_receive_your_request: has responded to your request! Please follow up with them.
someone_accept_offer: has responded to your offer! Please follow up with them.
otp_description: Check for OTP message and verify
toast_error_please_enter_unit_division: Please enter Unit / Division / Function / Location
toast_press_again_to_exit: Please click BACK again to exit
enable_location: Please enable your location without location app will not work
label_app_need_location_permission: Application need location permission, please click the below button to allow permission
message_permission: This app needs permission to use this feature. You can grant them in app settings.

please_select_provider_helper: Please select provider or helper first
request_call_him: They will call you, or you may call them
